articles.title: Poor diet and lack of exercise: Survey reveals Americans unaware of colon cancer risk factors - Medical Xpress

articles.title: 'Horizon' Trailer Kevin Costner Unveils American Western Movie - Variety
articles.description: Kevin Costner revealed the trailer for ‘Horizon: An American Saga,’ the first of his four-part epic about the American West, in theaters this June.
